PerformanceRealization.$t: If someone is mean to your friend more than once, you are angry at them
If the person you are dating does something romantic to someone else once, become annoyed with them
If the person you are dating does three romantic things with someone else, you get angry at them! Grrr!
If someone does too many  mean things, they become a bully
If you are a nice person, you feel guilty for cheating on someone
If someone is doing too much romance with you
If you are already anoyed with someone and they keep being romantic with you too much you get angry
If you are a nice person and you see someone be mean to someone else multiple times, you will pity them
if people do nice things to you you stop being lonely
self destructive rebound
self destructive keeping the crush alive
If you have high romance toward someone and they do something positive to you, it makes you have a crush on them
If someone homewrecked you, you get pissed
If someone keeps misunderstanding you you get annoyed
If someone does something taboo to you you get embarrassed
If you're an introvert and someone you don't know well talks to you you get embarrassed
If a friend does something mean to you you're shaken
If a lover does something mean to you you're shaken
If you have three recent failed romance attempts you're desperate
If you have a successful romantic interaction you stop being desperate
If you have a successful romantic interaction you stop being desperate
a positive interaction stops shaken
3 funny things causes class clown
gross makes you grossed out
If the person you are dating if mean to your friends you get annoyed with them
If the person you are dating if mean to your friends and they keep doing it, you get angry at them!
If you have too many failed romance with your partner, you get sad
if a friend is romantic towards u and u not interested, grossed out
If someone does something mean to your gf
If someone does something rude to your gf
If someone does something lame to your gf
if someone does something successfully romantic to your crush you hate them
if your crush does anything positive to you the crush is renewed

Effects.$c:
<Effect id="10" accept="true" instantiationID="0">
          <PerformanceRealization>If you are jealous and anyone has been doing anything to your girl too much, you will become annoyed with them</PerformanceRealization>
          <ConditionRule>
            <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="other" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot="first"/>
            <Predicate type="trait" trait="jealous" first="initiator" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot="first"/>
            <Predicate type="SFDB label" first="responder" second="other" label="cat: positive" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="true" window="10" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="2" numTimesRoleSlot="both"/>
          </ConditionRule>
          <ChangeRule>
            <Predicate type="status" status="annoyed with" first="initiator" second="responder" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
          </ChangeRule>
        </Effect>
